name: Pixel Ship
description: Relax your self while you play a clam shoot´em up. This game has a lot of bugs. One of the bugs is in the main menu, when you press the button "play" to play sometimes doesn´t work, you just have to push it a couple more times in diferent spots of the button. It´s not finished, it was more of a learning game. I did it all myself. Hope you like it.
